user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I want to make it extra special. Can you provide me with a daily horoscope for tomorrow to get insights into what the stars have in store for her? Additionally, I would like to know her zodiac sign traits and compatibility with other signs using the Sign and Compatibility APIs.

TaskList.description: Determine the zodiac sign of the best friend based on her birth date.
Fetch the daily horoscope for the determined zodiac sign for tomorrow.
Retrieve the zodiac sign traits for the determined zodiac sign.
Fetch compatibility information of the determined zodiac sign with other zodiac signs.
